Fantastic central location for outdoor pickleball!

Located at 356 Tanglin Road, this venue features 8 spacious, well-maintained courts surrounded by greenery‚Äîan oasis right in the city. The courts are clearly marked, the nets are in great condition, and the layout provides plenty of room for comfortable play.

What really sets this place apart is how well-lit it is at night. The bright floodlights mean you can enjoy evening games without any visibility issues‚Äîperfect for those who work during the day or prefer cooler evening sessions.

It‚Äôs easy to get to, just minutes from Orchard, with nearby parking and public transport options. Whether you're a beginner or seasoned player, this is one of the best outdoor pickleball spots in Singapore. Highly recommend!

An exceptional tennis academy with outstanding coaches who are truly dedicated to nurturing young talent. Their structured yet engaging training approach has greatly improved my child‚Äôs skills and confidence on the court. It is disheartening to hear that they will be relocating due to the tenure expiry, as this academy has been a cherished part of the community. Wishing them all the best in their new location‚Äîwherever they go, their excellence will surely follow!

Great place to start learning tennis, centrally located, 3 courts which are mostly shadowed for afternoon classes. Instructors are very good to keep children engaged  and always open to any feedback to improve their serviceüëçüëçüëç
Centrally located. Three courts available for coaching lessons.
Absolute mosquito nightmare. Personally had many stripped mossies land on me despite sitting near the fan, around mossie could and spraying myself with repellent.
